mapper.insert: insert into hm_reply(mno, bno, replyer, rcontent) values (#{mno}, #{bno}, #{replyer}, #{rcontent})
mapper.select: select hm_reply.rno, hm_reply.mno, hm_reply.bno, hm_reply.replyer, hm_reply.rcontent, hm_reply.rdate, hm_reply.rupdate, hm_member.point from hm_reply inner join hm_member on hm_reply.mno=hm_member.mno where hm_reply.bno=#{bno};
mapper.update: update hm_reply set replyer=#{replyer}, rcontent=#{rcontent}, rupdate=sysdate() where rno=#{rno}
